ygData.subject: Re: Enchanters Spell Components
ygData.msgSnippet: I found a word (can t remember which one) off a named orc in Kithikor Forest.  He was about level 15. -Shadowwalker ... From: Valacian  To:
ygData.messageBody:
I found a word (can't remember which one) off a named orc in Kithikor
Forest. He was about level 15.

-Shadowwalker
